item.title: Ham Pot Pie
item.description: Ingredients Filling 3 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 pinch salt, or to taste 1/2 cup diced onions 1/3 cup diced carrots 1/3 cup diced celery 1/3 cup all-purpose flour 2 cups chicken broth 1/4 cup cream 1 cup cubed ham 1teaspoon minced fresh rosemary 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 pinch cayenne pepper 1/4 cup water, or as needed 1/2 cup frozen peas Hot Water Pastry 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon kosher salt 8 tablespoons unsalted butter 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon water, or as needed Egg Wash 1 large egg 1 teaspoon water Directions Melt butter with a pinch of salt in a saucepan over medium high heat, and saut√© onions, carrot, and celery until onions turn translucent, 3 to 5 minutes.
